short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An extension for Rental property investment analysis. As user browse real estate sites it computes financial metrics.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The extension serves as a co-pilot for simplifying rental property investment. It collects information from listings on Zillow and calculates financial metrics to assist you in comparing and selecting the right property for investment.
